Diane Awerbuck (amuru na 1 Eprel 1974) bu onye ode akwukwo South Afrika
Akwụkwọ akụkọ ya, Ugbo na abalị, meriri 2004 Commonwealth Writers' Prize, akwụkwọ mbụ kacha mma (Afrika na Caribbean), ma bụrụ ndị a họpụtara maka International Dublin Literary Award
Na afọ 2011, nchịkọta akụkọ ya dị mkpirikpi, Cabin Fever, bụ Random House Struik bipụtara
Akwụkwọ akụkọ ya, Ngwọta Ụlọ, bụ Random House Struik bipụtara na August 2012
Edepụtara ya aha maka ihe nrite Caine na afọ 2014, wee merie asọmpi Short Story Day Africa n'otu afọ ahụ
Ọ kụziiri ihe na Rustenburg Girls' High School ruo na afọ 2002
Tupu nke a, ọ rụrụ ọrụ dị ka onye nkụzi nke History na Cedar House; na nke Akụkọ na Aesthetics na AFDA, ụlọ akwụkwọ ihe nkiri, ma na Cape Town
Akụkọ ya na-abụghị akụkọ ifo apụtala na Mail & Guardian
Ọ na-enyocha akụkọ ifo maka South Afrikan Sunday Times
A na-ebipụta edemede ya na akụkọ mkpirisi ya mgbe niile ma asụgharịwokwa ọrụ ya na German, Swedish, Mandarin na Russian
Dọkịta ya nọ na akụkọ trauma: Mmụọ na Akwụkwọ Ozi: Trauma, Warb
Awerbuck na-edekwa dịka "Frank Owen", ya na onye na-ede akwụkwọ Alex Latimer
E bipụtara akwụkwọ akụkọ ha nke cowboy-apocalypse South na 2016 (southvsnorth.com)
